channel.title: Has anyone got demonik v2 client, source and database anymore?
channel.description:
Hello again,
I watched some youtube videos of my old server TeoScape, which was based on Demonik v2 client, and I decided to write it again, better than ever. But for certain reasons my computer got annihilated and therefore I've lost all the old files I had.
So, if anyone has the source I mentioned, It'd be greatly appriciated if you bothered to upload it, and post the link here. Why are all the old clients gone from the forums anyway? Only some raw versions without handlers or anything left.
Then to off-topic, correct me if I'm wrong, MoparScape forums were down for like month, weren't they? Why?
And finally, if someone would like to get a team for a RSC project, please send me a message or add me on msn <teo_selenius@hotmail.com> ~Dark Anima
EDIT: If no-one's got v2, I can do with v7 as well. EDIT2: I'm getting lonely, someone could even spam! EDIT3: I like german bondageporn [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] No requests.[/center]

item.title: Has anyone got demonik v2 client, source and database anymore?
item.dc:creator: @xxGRIMxxREAPERxx xxGRIMxxREAPERxx
item.description:
@xxGRIMxxREAPERxx wrote:

[quote=“i_pk_pjers_i, post:3, topic:210645”]nobody has v2 anymore, idk about v7 but i doubt it. theres divinepk though which has bugs fixed and tones of things added. link: http://www.speedyshare.com/973570745.html[/quote] I got V7…
@ Dark Anima (or anyone else):
If you want demonik v7, pm me =]

Read full topic
